thread.title: Sedona, Arizona: First Destination to be awarded to join THE LIST
thread.title_full: Sedona, Arizona: First Destination to be awarded to join THE LIST

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Sedona, Arizona: First Destination to be awarded to join THE LIST
text:
Sedona, Arizona: First Destination to be awarded to join THE LIST Adv: 
Jul 03, 2015 Adv: 
eTurboNews (eTN) has awarded its first destination to be added to THE LIST. The award goes to Sedona, Arizona, USA. 
THE LIST is the eTN 5-star rating not only for 5 star businesses. 5 star means offering a unique experience for visitors. 
It's a new way to recognize destinations, hotels, airlines, cruise-lines, attractions, PR companies, media, personalities or any member in the global travel and tourism industry. 
There is no nomination or marketing fee. To get on THE LIST, you don't have to invite journalists, and you don't have to advertise with eTN. 
THE LIST is absolutely free and based on first-hand feedback by eTN readers not affiliated with the business or destination they nominate to receive the eTN 5-star rating. 
The nomination for Sedona was triggered after publishing Praising Arizona . The unique scenery of Sedona, Arizona has made the little town of 20,000 full-time residents a magnet for tourists, but the town government has worked to keep its Old West character. 
Sherry Henry, Director for the Arizona Office of Tourism, said: "We're thrilled that Sedona, Arizona, is being recognized as a 5-star destination. Sedona is one of our state's most popular visitor destinations and it's exciting to see it get the recognition is so richly deserves." 
eTN Publisher Juergen T. Steinmetz said: “Sedona is a mystical destination like no other. Sedona's scenery and energy is breathtaking and exciting." 
“We’re thrilled Sedona is the first destination to be added to THE LIST. For Sedona to be the first on THE LIST is well deserved.” 
We encourage everyone to help us with our search for destinations, hotels, airlines, attractions, etc. to be added to THE LIST.
